body:
So me and Jongh are gonna play some OCN later and I'm most likely gonna record it.

Would anyone from avicus like to join us I will let the first 6 people who ask join.

All I need to know is your Skype. And if you can be on in 2 hours from when I make this post

title: Recording OCN

replies.body:
the fuck? This is avicus.. and you're trying to get attention from Avicus to join your fucking recording? Dude go somewhere else and ask this. 

I'm not advertising any server here, but you should go to OVERCAST NETWORK's forums if you want someone to join your recording! Learn

( sorry for the disrespect but i'm getting really mad! )

As stated above, if you would like to play on another server, please refer to their forums, not ours. Thanks!
